content: The request to rename the ProductPlan resource to InsurancePlan was approved by PA. Was there anything else that FMG was looking for with that resource proposal?
And should I change the name in the resource proposal itself, have noted its new name internally.
should change the name of the proposal, I think
Changing names on the wiki is a bit of a pain. For other renamed resources we haven't bothered.
I'll give it a try and see what happens, actually I see what you mean Lloyd, I just changes the name of the section at the top
